location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the first folio with 1 and terminates at the final folio with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file consists of the notes to a file concerning the Agency Court Deposit Account of the Political Agency, Bahrain. The correspondence that would originally have accompanied the notes appears not to have been preserved.The papers give some details of the account balance at various dates, and some details of receipts and interest paid.
